languages.text: "Сблизиться с ксеносом? Неслыханная ересь! Укажи мне на эту сумасбродку, и ее тут же настигнет заслуженная кара!"
"Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"
languages.original_text: "Сблизиться с ксеносом? Неслыханная ересь! Укажи мне на эту сумасбродку, и ее тут же настигнет заслуженная кара!"

traits.locale_text: "To grow close with a xenos? An unspeakable heresy! Show me the madcap woman so she can be properly punished!"
"To grow close with a xenos? An unspeakable heresy! Show me the madcap woman so she can be properly punished!"
"Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"
"Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"
"Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

languages.text: “居然有人敢亲近异形？多么可恶的异端行为！带我去见那个疯女人，我要好好地惩罚她！”
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: “居然有人敢亲近异形？多么可恶的异端行为！带我去见那个疯女人，我要好好地惩罚她！”

languages.text: «¿Confraternizar con una xenos? ¡Qué herejía más ignominiosa! ¡Dime dónde está esa lunática y me aseguraré de que sea castigada como merece!».
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Confraternizar con una xenos? ¡Qué herejía más ignominiosa! ¡Dime dónde está esa lunática y me aseguraré de que sea castigada como merece!».

languages.text: « Fraterniser avec une xénos ? C'est de l'hérésie pure et simple ! Montrez-moi cette démente, je veillerai à la châtier comme il convient ! »
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: « Fraterniser avec une xénos ? C'est de l'hérésie pure et simple ! Montrez-moi cette démente, je veillerai à la châtier comme il convient ! »

languages.text: "Fraternisierung mit einer Xenos? Unaussprechliche Ketzerei! Führt mich zu dieser Wahnsinnigen, dann sorge ich für eine angemessene Bestrafung!"
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Fraternisierung mit einer Xenos? Unaussprechliche Ketzerei! Führt mich zu dieser Wahnsinnigen, dann sorge ich für eine angemessene Bestrafung!"

languages.text: 「異種族との交友だと？言いようのない異端だ！この狂女に会わせろ。相応の罰を受けさせてやる！」
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: 「異種族との交友だと？言いようのない異端だ！この狂女に会わせろ。相応の罰を受けさせてやる！」

languages.text: "Zenolarla dostluk kurmak mı? Akılalmaz bir kâfirlik! O deli kadını bana göster, hak ettiği cezayı almasını sağlayayım!"
languages.original_text: "Fraternising with a xenos? Unspeakable heresy! Show me to this madwoman, and I shall see that she is suitably punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Zenolarla dostluk kurmak mı? Akılalmaz bir kâfirlik! O deli kadını bana göster, hak ettiği cezayı almasını sağlayayım!"
